en_raw: [Heh, sorry, sorry!]

en_clean: [So, here again, huh? Don't worry, you'll get to zone out during this entire event if you want. But there is something...]

en_raw: [You're able to zone through most conversations you've seen at least once, yes... But some of them might be slightly different!]
en_clean: [You're able to zone through most conversations you've seen at least once, yes... But some of them might be slightly different!]
jp_raw: [すでに経験した会話であれば、ほとんどの場合ぼんやりしてやり過ごすことができるんだ...\!\ でも会話によっては少し内容が変わることもある。]
jp_clean: [すでに経験した会話であれば、ほとんどの場合ぼんやりしてやり過ごすことができるんだ... でも会話によっては少し内容が変わることもある。]

en_raw: [Oh, don't stress out about it. Don't worry, if it was REALLY important, you'd stop zoning out immediately. But remember that just because you can zone out, doesn't mean the events will be exactly the same!]
en_clean: [Oh, don't stress out about it. Don't worry, if it was REALLY important, you'd stop zoning out immediately. But remember that just because you can zone out, doesn't mean the events will be exactly the same!]

jp_clean: [いや、心配することはないよ。大丈夫、本当に重要な会話であれば、すっ飛ばすことはできなくなるんだ。ただ、ぼんやりできるからといって、まったく同じイベントとは限らない。それだけ覚えといて！]

en_raw: [So... To zone out, and miss some small things, or to listen to it all again? What a dilemma!]
